Description:
TITLED READY TO BUILD 616m2 BLOCK
Build your band new home today on a 616m2 block north facing in the Park Central Estate situated off rix road in officer. Finding the only opportunity to secure not only one of the biggest blocks in the estate but one of the biggest blocks in the area, 3/4 quarter fenced with all the amenities a short distance away. Opportunity to build 30+ square home and enjoy a relaxed life style merge fresh air and sunshine of outdoor living in big back garden , entertain whilst giving your children a safe place to play and enjoy summer BBQ there is room to even put in your own swimming pool .all of this in a friendly neighbourhood with parkland, playground within walking distance, offering a choice of great schools and amenities with Officer train station just down the road and supermarkets and local shops just 5 minutes away in Beaconsfield, officer or 15 minutes to heart of Berwick this location offers so much whilst giving the feeling of being in the country.

Description:
Scenery that is simply breathtaking
Alex Scott and Staff are proud to present 205 Dickie Road, Officer. An outstanding lifestyle property on 14.72 acres with spectacular views over the city lights and out to Westernport Bay. The residence offers 3 generous sized bedrooms all with built in robes. The Master bedroom with ensuite also offers some of those amazing views. Not a bad way to start your day.
Both main bathroom and ensuite have been recently renovated and are sure to please. The kitchen offers double sink, dishwasher, timber bench tops, ample storage space, 900mm oven and 5 burner gas cooktop. There is a large open living room with cosy wood fire place and for your comfort ducted evaporative cooling.
Other features include 6 solar panels, mature fruit trees, 4 road access points, good internet service (ADSL2), 2 car carport, 3 dams, two very substantial sheds 9mx5m and 10mx7.5m. There is also 3 phase power at the fount of the property should you want to put it on. Across the road from EA Owen Conservation Reserve a great place for a bushwalk. Located only a short drive from Berwick, Beaconsfield, Pakenham and all that they have to offer. One of the finest features of the property is the elevated covered entertaining platform. The perfect place to entertain and will leave your guests green with envy. The property is lightly treed and has about 8 acres of cleared pastures. Call Matt Koster today to secure your own private inspection. 7 days a week at all hours.

Sun splashed and situated for success
We are proud to offer this outstanding property for your consideration.
Surrounded by quality schooling, park lands, shops and transport, everything you need will be right at your fingertips!
The moment you walk through the front door it will just feel like home. Comprising of 3 spacious bedrooms, 2 well appointed bathrooms and an open plan living area coupled with a double lock up garage, this home is the complete package.
With all the added extras you have come to expect including ducted heating, split system cooling and internal access from the garage.
So if you're looking for an outstanding start as you enter the property market or looking to add to your investment portfolio, then your search ends today.
Inspect with complete confidence.

Description:
Great Value In Grandvue
Sale By Set Date - 28th June at 6pm.
A modern open plan design, premiere location and affordable price tag combine to make this an irresistible opportunity that you don't want to miss. Beautifully presented, and light and bright throughout, it's a home that will prove a real joy to live in for many years to come.
A galley kitchen offers plenty of workspace and storage, with quality appliances including dishwasher. Adjacent is a very generous meals area, and a large family room which together make the perfect space for day-to-day life.
The master bedroom features a walk-in robe plus en-suite while the remaining bedrooms are generously sized and robed. Added features that ensure your comfort include internal access from the garage, air-conditioner and ducted heating.
Outside are very low maintenance gardens and an appealing and private under roofline alfresco entertaining space that provides a delightful retreat.
In an elevated north side position in arguably the most sought after neighborhood in Officer, this is the perfect place to buy. Book your tour today.

Description:
MUST SEE HOME
Situated in the highly sought after Arena Estate Officer, sits this beautifully presented family home that will tick all the boxes. Spotlessly presented inside and out, there is nothing left for you to do but relax and enjoy the magnificent lifestyle on offer. With a fantastic list of feature's and inclusions such as:
- 3 double bedrooms, the master with WIR and BIR plus full en-suite complete with double vanity and shower.
- Fully appointed kitchen with stone benches and stainless steel appliances leading onto open plan living area.
- Large study nook, a spacious family room with split system air-conditioning.
- Double garage with rear and internal access.
- Alfresco with fan and blinds to enjoy the outdoors all year round, plus much more, your friends will be green with envy.
All this stunning quality and fantastic lifestyle is located in close proximity to schools, shops, public transport and park lands and is in an area that is growing faster in value than most can keep up with. To avoid disappointment call today to book your inspection.

Description:
Flawless Design Meets Superb Finish!
Occasionally a home hits the market that meets every need and want, and this standout in a premium Arena location is one.
Designed with family in mind, 4 double bedrooms plus a separate oversized study, master bedroom with a fully fitted dressing room, magnificent ensuite enjoys a double shower with tiled base, twin vanities and separate toilet, bedrooms 2/3/4 are faultless in their own wing, walk in robes to each of them, serviced by a central bathroom and powder room adds further class and convenience.
Exquisite kitchen is the heartbeat of the home, with a massive breakfast bar-servery, walk in pantry, pot draws & glass splash back, oversized meals/dining space is equally impressive.
Living space is brilliantly executed with a large central family room, separate rumpus/theatre room must be seen to appreciate, additional separate teens retreat is very impressive, features are extensive with gas ducted heating, multiple split systems for complete comfort, stunning timber floors, high ceilings, upgraded internal doors, select window shutters along with block out modern drapes signifies quality and the oversize double remote garage with internal access is so convenient.
Outdoors the drive & path are premium exposed aggregate finish, super-size alfresco allows for year round entertaining and enjoyment, easy care grounds allows you to enjoy this first rate estate 'Arena' surrounded by quality real estate, massive parks, walking tracks, one of the most popular shopping centers in the district within walking distance from the home, choice location, superb home & one of the finest floor plans.
Live, Love Arena!

Description:
Build Your Dream in Timbertop
Located in the Timbertop Estate, on the north side of Officer, is this 560m2 (approx.) rectangular block situated at the back of the estate which is fully fenced and offers elevated views. The block is titled and ready for you to build your dream home on - with the estate establishing fast and already full of quality homes, it is proving to be a popular attraction. Timbertop Estate provides great access to many private and public schools as well as many shopping precincts including Beaconsfield Village and the Arena Shopping Centre and is a short 3km drive to the Monash Freeway. Don't miss this opportunity to build your new home in this ideal location. Call now for further information.
Emma Andrews : 0407 053 200

Description:
Ready To Just Move In
Are you looking for a new home but the idea of waiting for over a year to move in doesn’t sit well with you? Then look no further than this practically brand new home in the rapidly growing Officer precinct. Featuring an open centrally located kitchen with SS appliances, ample bench and cupboard space that cater well to both indoor and outdoor dining options. A great floor plan with a generous sized family room and separate dining room, which are practical and functional. Three good-sized bedrooms all with mirrored robes and the master bedroom features walk in robes and an ensuite. The home is presented exceptionally with stunning timber floors and has ducted heating, spilt system cooling, double glassed windows, connected to the NBN, double lock up garage and a private low maintenance backyard.
This is an ideal first home, perfect downsizer or investment property all within the rapidly growing Officer market. Call now to make an appointment to secure this great home.

Description:
Double Delight in Officer!
This modern home is located in the new Arcadia Estate in Officer, offering easy access to all amenities, Cardinia Train Station and schools in nearby Pakenham, Beaconsfield and Berwick.
Immaculately presented both inside and out, this four bedroom plus study home offers a free flowing layout that will accommodate everyone.
The ground floor consists of large study, powder room, spacious open plan family room, dining area and the impressive kitchen has a huge 900mm stainless steel oven and Caesar-stone bench tops.
Upstairs you will find four bedrooms, master with ensuite and WIR. All other bedrooms featuring built in robes.
Decked alfresco area is ideal for entertaining guests and overlooks the spacious backyard.
Additional features include double garage with remote control, ducted heating and garden shed.
With all of the hard work done already, simply move in and enjoy this stylish home!!!

Description:
The Affordable Dream
Peake Real Estate and Neilson Partners in conjunction are proud to market this 20 acre hobby farm with magnificent pastures, superbly located within close proximity to the Victorian Equestrian Centre, Upper Beaconsfield & Officer Pony Clubs . Set high on the hill & overlooking some of the regions finest views, the main residence consists of 4 bedrooms, master with walk in robes & double vanity ensuite. A shiny, brand new kitchen is lined in caesarstone, features stainless steel European appliances & has a large walk-in pantry. New flooring throughout, recently painted & ready to simply move in.
A new cosy wood heater is the main feature of the front living space, 6 reverse cycle inverter split system a/c’s for year round comfort. To the rear of the home is a large rumpus, leading out to a decking area, soaking in the Westerly views across to Port Phillip Bay. This property caters for teenagers, or live-in parents – a separate bungalow with bedroom, ensuite & toilet - a large sitting room with fully equipped kitchenette & reverse cycle split system. The outdoor entertaining mecca has to be seen, fully fitted with external kitchen bbq area & sheltered from any weather – all year entertaining will be a breeze! For the horse enthusiast, you can’t look past the 11 paddocks of post & rail fencing with electric fencing, self-feeding water troughs & a central laneway system for convenience. The land is undulating yet all fully useable. The property could be said to be drought proof with 95,000 Litres of water tank storage for the home, a large dam with a stock and domestic bore to supply the paddocks & gardens. There is also a large 12m x 11m shed, with concrete floor & power - a floodlit 20m round yard is on offer too. A conveniently placed lifestyle that most would envy.
Agent in Conjunction:
Nyall Greene, First National Real Estate Pakenham - Neilson Partners. 0409 560 778

Description:
20 PASTURED ACRES WITH VIEWS AND DUAL LIVING!
Neilson Partners and Peake Real Estate in conjunction are proud to market this superbly located property on the Carpenter Road end of Dickie Road Officer with panoramic views towards Port Phillip Bay, this 20 acre lifestyle property will impress with the first look. An auto remote gated entry guides you to the residence, a long driveway allowing views over the property with post and rail fencing (with hot wire) delineating 11 paddocks with reticulated water and with laneways providing safe and easy stock movement. The residence, secluded amongst mature gardens and magnificent shade trees, benefits greatly from extensive rejuvenation and presents in as new condition. Offering four spacious bedrooms, the master complete with a walk in wardrobe and a full ensuite bathroom. A shiny brand new kitchen offers Caesar stone benchtops, stainless steel European appliances, glass splashbacks and walk in pantry. Three light filled formal and informal living areas with split air conditioning provides year around comfort, the formal lounge room with the added charm of a solid fuel heater. Outdoor living and entertaining is a breeze with a broad decking beautifully positioned to take advantage of the sweeping view. A fabulous covered outdoor entertaining area is a sight to behold with a fully equipped outdoor kitchen, sheltered from weather and with a walk through two car garage with auto-remote Perspex panelled door. A separate bungalow with carport caters for teenagers or extended family with a bedroom, ensuite bathroom and a spacious sitting room with a fully equipped kitchenette and split air conditioning. The property is currently set up for horses, but can be versatile to all forms of animal husbandry, with undulating cleared pastures and boundary shelter trees. A reliable stock bore, dam and almost 100,000 litres of fresh water storage essentially drought proofs the property. A large gravelled hard stand provides excellent parking, storage and access to a 12m x 11m steel shed (concrete floored and powered) and a 20m floodlit round yard. Convenient to the Victorian Equestrian centre, Upper Beaconsfield and Officer Pony clubs, this is a mecca for the equine enthusiast and offers an enviable lifestyle in a coveted North of Highway location.
Agent in Conjunction:
Kristen Turner, Peake Real Estate 0410 615 228

Description:
It's All Done For You - Just Move In
This beautifully built Hebel home has everything you could wish for. Built in Hebel (excellent insulation and sound proofing) by a private builder with quality fittings throughout.
There are 3 spacious bedrooms, separate study, lounge room, family room, large kitchen with separate walk in pantry and loads of cupboards. The laundry also has a wall of cupboards. There is a walk in linen press and large broom cupboard. This house was designed with lots of storage space.
The main bedroom has a large walk in robe and large ensuite with separate toilet. There are built in robes in the other two bedrooms. The kitchen has caeserstone benchtops, glass splashback, an induction cooktop and quality stainless steel double oven and dishwasher.
There is a lovely al fresco area under the roof line. This home has ducted gas central heating and ducted evaporative cooling. There is a double garage with remote control. Crimsafe has been fitted to the bathroom, ensuite and toilet windows. Security doors have been installed on all external doors including the sliding doors to the alfresco area.
The garden has been lovingly planted, is well looked after and easy to maintain. Everything is done - all you have to do is move in....

Description:
Sophisticated Living on a Generous Block
Situated on a corner allotment, with provision for a caravan, boat or extra vehicles makes this stunning property attractive to the most discerning buyer. Every inch has been styled and appointed to perfection, from the striking facade to the superb interior. The most professional stylist would find it difficult to fault. The family friendly floor plan boasts downstairs master suite, designer kitchen adjacent to dining and family room making the most of open plan living. A separate lounge/theatre room offers a cosy, intimate setting while the upstairs retreat has been designed for the younger family members to retire. Features ducted heating, evaporate cooling, double ensuite and walk in robes to master, beautifully appointed kitchen, guest powder room, automated watering system and direct entry to the double, remote garage. Outdoors blends seamlessly with indoors, through timber bi folds opening out to decked al fresco. Meticulously, manicured gardens make for a picturesque, private setting that will be the envy of all. Two access points to the sizeable back yard ad a practical element to this pristine property. Located in the exclusive, Arena Estate, in the heart of one of the largest schooling precinct's in the state, close to the Officer shopping complex, public transport and Freeway makes for convenient living.
Contact Amanda Charles - 0400 347 968

Description:
Family Friendly, Five Bedroom Living
Situated within easy walking distance to Arena Shopping complex is this sophisticated home of generous proportions, ideal for a large family. The versatile floor plan boasts 5 bedrooms, study, fully appointed, stone kitchen with butlers pantry, adjacent to dining and family room. A separate, enclosed lounge or theatre room is the ideal space for the younger family members to retire. The home offers storage galore, with walk in robes to 4 bedrooms and a dressing room off the master. Modern conveniences include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, powder room for guests, ensuite to master and direct entry to the double, remote garage. Outdoor alfresco is the ideal space to entertain, overlooking manicured lawns and established trees. The convenient location will appeal to families who like their independence, with public transport, schooling, restaurants, shopping centres all at your door step.
This affordable property is expected to be short lived on the market so be prompt to inspect.

Description:
The best of modern day living in Arena
If you have been searching for that home that has the best of everything then look no further.
From the location to the quality décor and design of the home, quality fixtures and fittings nothing is left for you to do except move in.
Located in the prestigious Arena estate this ex display home will be sure to please, the home comprises of four bedrooms, three living rooms, two bathrooms plus powder room and a double lock up remote garage and it features a secluded back yard with alfresco area and your very own swim spa and veggie garden.
With a fantastic layout catering for everyone, a generous size bedroom is located downstairs along with your very own theatre room. The kitchen being the heart of the home is perfect with stone benchtops, amble cupboard space, 900mm freestanding stove, set in a perfect position of the home overlooking the dining room, family rooms and the alfresco area making it perfect for entertaining all year round.
Upstairs you will find the rumpus room, perfect for the younger ones of the family, remaining oversized bedrooms and huge master bedroom with very own walk in robe and oversized ensuite with double vanity and double shower.
Other feature of the home also include; internal access from double garage, evaporative cooling, ducted heating and alarm.
This home will be sure to complete your house hunting, in one of the most sought after estates in Officer, close to shops, schools, public transport, freeways and more.

Description:
Low Maintenance Living in Style
Designed to impress and finished to perfection, is this elegant home, positioned in the sought after Arena Estate. This stylish, young residence offers the fortunate buyer a lifestyle of utmost comfort, luxury and ease. The floor plan enjoys 3 bedrooms (all with storage), fully appointed kitchen, incorporating casual dining and family room. Features ensuite and walk in robe to master, ducted heating, split system cooling, ample storage and direct entry to the double, remote garage. The outdoor setting compliments the style indoors offers, with a low maintenance, private, secure yard and alfresco entertaining. This property will appeal to investors, with tenants currently residing in the home, making for a solid return. The position offers convenient living, being within close proximity to Arena Shopping Complex, Schooling, Monash Freeway and public transport. Act promptly to avoid disappointment.
Contact Amanda Charles - 0400 347 968

Description:
"PURELY MAJESTIC - GRANDVUE ESTATE OFFICER"
Its all about location! Walking distance to shopping precinct, schools, parkland and public transport makes this beautifully presented family home a must see. This elegant residence awaits your inspection.
- Boasting 4 large living areas;
- Gourmet kitchen with stainless steel appliances.
- Gas log fire,Ducted gas heating, split system air conditioning.
- 4 Double size bedrooms, master complete with Walk in Robe and ensuite, and Study nook.
- Double car garage.
- Good side access for caravan, boat, or extra vehicles.
- Large Block . Approx 680m2. Ideal space for a swimming pool, or extra shedding.
- Outdoor alfresco entertaining area,
Being elevated you will also be spoilt with views over officer and beyond.Why build? This home is well worth an inspection to appreciate whats on offer. You will not be disappointed.
